summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of DocFlow document management system. All core workflows tested successfully including login, document upload, OCR processing, batch creation, PDF consolidation, and download functionality.
passed_tests: Document upload API - 4 PDF files from /tmp
PDF download functionality from Batches page
PDF download functionality from PDFs Consolidados page
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Upload, Documents, Batches, PDFs)
Real-time status updates and progress tracking
Responsive UI design and user experience
